product_name: SRAM Rival OCT Crankset with GXP Cups - 50/34
long_description: Put the power to the road while saving weight with the Rival OCT 50/34 crankset from SRAM. Utilizing Open Core Technology, the crank arms are hollow-forged from 6066 aluminum for maximum strength and polished to a beautiful shine. Hard-anodized PowerGlide(TM) 10-speed chainrings ensure long-lasting performance. The SRAM Rival OCT crankset includes a GXP(TM) bottom bracket, which increases power transfer and rigidity while reducing component wear.
short_description: Put the power to the road while saving weight with the Rival OCT 50/34 crankset from SRAM.
